stimulusHtml: The setting on the machine is now changed so that the person burns f(t)+c calories per minute. For this setting, find c so that an average of 15 calories per minute is burned during the time interval 6≤t≤18.

features.html: The rate, in calories per minute, at which a person using an exercise machine burns calories is modeled by the function \(f\). In the figure above, \(f\left(t\right)=-\frac{1}{4}t^3+\frac{3}{2}t^2+1\) for \(0\le t\le4\) and \(f\) is piecewise linear for \(4\le t\le24\).
